original_text: Then Rebekah and her female servants left there, together with Abraham's servant. They took camels to ride on. That was how the servant took Rebekah and left.
korean_text: 리브가가 일어나 여자 종들과 함께 낙타를 타고 그 사람을 따라가니 그 종이 리브가를 데리고 가니라

sentences.original_text: Then Rebekah and her female servants left there
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 리브가와 그녀의 여종들은 그곳을 떠났고

sentences.original_text: They took camels to ride on
That was how the servant took Rebekah
